page.title: 16TICKHILL GALA
page.content: The Gala takes place on the first Saturday in July.It is supported by local{clubs.}Before the Gala begins each separate club thinks of a theme and decorates a lorry with it.Then they form a convoy through the village to the field where the Gala is held. There are lots of stalls some with games,some with gifts to buy (books, toys),some with food,drink,(hotdogs, icecream,orange squash,lime juice). During the day there are lots of {competitions}eg.flower arranging,the most obedient dog,the best pets.There are races for all ages,from babies to pensioners.The pubs also compete against each other.Last year they had an obstacle course.
